ComicInfo.Title: R. Crumb's Grotesque Burlesque Presents Championship Wrestling; Id; Id, Super-Ego, Ego:
ComicInfo.Summary:
36 pages (including the 4 cover pages) of illustrations, sketches and comic stories focusing on the author’s sexual fantasies.
“All material in this book was taken from R. Crumb’s personal, private, secret sketchbooks” says the editor.
Contents"Enter Super-Ego" (1 p., Comic Book)“To Any Woman Reading this Magazine” (1 p., Illustration with text)“Things that Really Happened!” (4 pl., Comic Book)"Nancy" (may 1990) (1 p., Illustration)"Mary" (aug 1986) (1 p., Illustration)"Bo Bo Bolinski" (1985) (1 p., Illustration with text)"Great Moments" (1 p., Illustration with text)"Why Can’t I… Get with the Program?!?" (1 p., Illustration with text)"R. Crumb’s Grotesque Burlesque presents Championship Wrestling" (21 p., Comic Book)"Mr. Defective" (sep 1989) (1 p., Illustration with text)"What’s His Problem?" (1 p., Illustration with text)"Fun" (1 p., Illustration with text)
